outputs.output_descr: The porject is aimed at strengthening capacity for gender mainstreaming ad decision-making executive and local administrative levels, improving legislative and policy areas, increaseing gender awareness, including through mass media, and improving gender lobbying through the following component scheme: conduct of trainings, provision of policy advice and research and increase of public awareness

project_descr: Promotion of gender equality in the Republic of Kazakhstan
project_title: Promotion of Gender Equality in Kazakhstan
